title: Know What Battle You're Fighting | Guests: Megyn Kelly & Michael Shellenberger | 3/1/22
description:
Glenn gives some updates on the aftermath of Russia's invasion, including the decline of the ruble and the hit on the president of Ukraine. Journalist Megyn Kelly joins to give some insight on what’s going on in Vladimir Putin’s head and what his intentions might be. Author Michael Shellenberger joins Glenn to discuss America’s energy dependence on foreign countries. Pat Gray joins to discuss President Biden’s upcoming State of the Union address. Glenn discusses the latest from the World Economic Forum and the new digital ID system. Good news is hard to come by, but Glenn shares one good news story about the latest pro-life victory. Glenn and Stu predict what will be said during President Biden's State of the Union address.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
